name: NewHomesCharlotte

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
As a Realtor® licensed in North and South Carolina, Terri provides Strategic Marketing and Transaction Management services to her clients in the Charlotte 
North Carolina area. Her market expertise includes Waxhaw, Marvin, and Weddington in North Carolina and across the state line in Indian Land, Fort Mill and Lancaster, in South Carolina. Her business is built on her experience in New Construction from Contract to Close and Sales and Marketing. Focusing her ability to cater and adapt to all her client’s Real Estate needs through her efforts of gaining Trust, Dedication to her client’s needs through her high level of Communication and Loyalty. “Just as the Real Estate industry evolves to become more innovative and technologically driven, so do I. I am Always learning new technology to help keep my clients informed and up-to-date on the ever-changing real estate markets.” 

A Charlotte, North Carolina Area resident for over 14 years, her knowledge of the city’s geography can assist you with all your Residential Real Estate endeavors on both sides of the state line! In addition, she provides exceptional Real Estate services to ensure you feel confident with your decision to hire her. “With my attention to detail, commitment to my clients and understanding of the Charlotte area market, I will do my best to help you find, contract and close on your New Home!” 

Terri graduated from Central Christian University with an associate degree in Biblical Studies. “Ethics is first and foremost with me, I strive to treat all my clients and customers with the utmost care, loyalty, diligence and enthusiasm in every area of their real estate transaction.” 

Her experience in New Home Construction Operations, Sales and Marketing, Closings and Commercial Property Management, enables her to successfully and seamlessly complete the home buying and selling process from Contract to Close! “I am results and focused driven, I will ensure you have exceptional real estate transaction experience!”
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
